nodes.experience:
I was an engineering intern at Disruptor Beam last summer. Disruptor Beam was a game company that made mobile games based on popular IPs. While there, I worked on two separate projects, one recently just released on the app store this past week. I worked both client side in Unity and server side in Ruby to create player support tools. 

I am also currently working for Code Coven, as an engineer, and while this is not technically a co-op, I was able to home my skills as both a programmer and a game developer. At Code Coven I worked as the sole programmer, and was able to try new things in Unity.
